title: Looking for members for flex/tournaments
body:
Hi, we are an amateur team looking for keen players who play TOP/MID/ADC. Pref high Silv - Gold - Plat. We currently have two members who were Gold 4 and Gold 5 last season and one Plat 4 player. We usually play in the afternoon and late night but different times can be arranged. Hit me up if you are interested.

-IGN: RespeckMyName
